name: Zombie Boy finds Love
description:
Submission for Horrors for my Valentine game jam

Help Zombie Boy find his missing body parts perhaps his missing love

There's a total of 3 stages to the pinball minigame

With cutscenes at the beginning and the end

Please play at fullscreen in browser or download the game! We couldn't figure out how to scale the game properly with the html setup 

Controls
during cutscenes, click on textbox to continue 

Steps to play game:

1.) click head - to stop arrow for aiming

2.) F key - to shoot head (strength corresponds to power meter)

Credits
story - jocez, cooltofu, and Emilia

coding - jocez

art and music - cooltofu

voice and script - Emilia
